author: Diederik van der Boor
message:
> It was fun to demonstrate the new Gwenview without telling visitors I was actually its author. This way I got objective reactions to the application.

Nice one, and did you get good feedback out of this?

author: E@zyVG
message:
I really like Gwenview - it is the best among its class. Thanks for the great application.

Okular is another great new application with KDE 4. Apart from that. even with all the ins and outs of KDE 4.0 release, I am actually loving it and even using it as my primary DE, though also have 3.5.8 on my openSUSE 10.3.

author: Aurélien
message:
@Diederik van der Boor: Feedback about Gwenview was mostly positive. People liked the save bar. And lots of them were glad that the user interface got simplified.

@E@zyVG: Thanks!
